import{Stick}from'components';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var mapGraphic=function mapGraphic(precent,isEternal){var maxLength=25;/**
	 * maxLength = max stick in block
	 * everyone stick has gradient color
	 *
	 * so... if you add 26,27,28 and so on =>
	 * you need add gradint for
	 * :nth-child(26), :nth-child(27), :nth-child(28)
	 */var countActiveSticks=Math.round(precent*maxLength/100);var arrSticks=[];var i=0;while(i<25){i<=countActiveSticks?arrSticks.push(/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Stick,{isEternal:isEternal,idx:i},i))// fill color stick
:arrSticks.push(/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Stick,{isEmpty:true,idx:i},i));// empty stick
i++;}return arrSticks.map(function(s){return s;});};export default mapGraphic;
